Hopefully  you subscribed exact amount. If you subscribed more or less than the indicated amount  you may not get the promised rewards. Eg. $760.I subscribed $88k for 60++ days on 5.8% which is $760.During the 60 days  I received $574.77 of total revenue.After first appeal  moomoo gave me $87 cash coupon.After second appeal  moomoo gave me another $40 cash coupon.Total rewards I received is only $574.77 + $87 + $40 =$701.77for $88k of Fullerton cash fund subscriptions. Less than $760 of what moomoo promised.Currently  trying third appeal.
